name: Unchangeable
description:
A short story based game that features being stuck in a loop.

You cannot change the loop.

You will always have a bad ending.

Also features '3d' backgrounds.

Z - A (Also used for killing and interacting)

X - Speed up text

WASD/Arrow keys - Movement

Somethings to explain:

  • Lack of gameplay              

This is less an arcade game, like most others, and more a book. An interactive              book. It's okay if it's not your type. I just wanted to be more unique, meaning                      that this theme is more like a writing prompt. Maybe I will just ignore the                         theme next time.

  • Lots of talking               

It's hard to show not tell when it's a gameboy game and you cannot draw to                       save your life.

  • Bad hitboxes

I cannot control that.
